messages.message:
Hi Folks, if you haven’t already joined the `Engineering Incident Review` channel on workplace: https://instabase.workplace.com/groups/918279532363733 you should join it.  In this channel we post the incidents that are going to be reviewed in the weekly Incident Meeting.  Incident meetings are a great place to come and understand system architecture, how our system fail, how do we recover from failures, and how do we make our system stronger.  This is one of the fastest way to absorb the system architecture!  We have a great lineup tomorrow:
• file-service-v2 [Xi]
• Arch environment timeouts in Refiner and OCR when running Flows [Lydia]
• Arch environments annotation issue [Josh]
